titles.title: Congratulating Oprah Winfrey for her 20 years of exemplary work and service to the people of the United States and the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/17/2005--Introduced. Congratulates Oprah Winfrey for her 20 years of exemplary work and service to the people of the United States and the world.
